document_name: Increasing Representation of Effectively Managed Marine Ecosystems in the Protected Areas

outputs.output_descr: Collecting data, conducting feasibility analysis, risk assessment, developing strategy, fine-tuning the activities and preparing budget for the full-size project both in UNDP format and in Global Environment Fund format. During project document preparation the need of the country in enhancing the management of protected areas will be analyzed, the opportunity to expand their territories will be investigated and necessary arrangement will be envisioned to make it possible.

project_descr: Increasing Representation of Effectively Managed Marine Ecosystems in the Protected Area System
